name: Dynasty (itch)
description:
Dynasty is a vertical shooter game. Put yourself on the shoes of a chinese princess, gliding through an evershifting sky while fighting powerful Zodiac spirits. Keep firing while you manage to survive as long as possible, evading the enemies' attacks.

Instructions

·You can only be hurt in the white circle in the middle of your cape
·Picking up a Point Box after losing HP will grant you 1 HP back

Controls
·Move with the keyboard arrows or W [Up] A [Left] S [Down] D [Right]
·Shoot with space
·Press ESC in-game to access the Pause Menu

Game made by Juan Belío, Sergi Monreal, Sergi Pinto, Anaïs Salla and José Zoilo
